reviews.review: 不得不说，这款游戏是真的经典之作，打的我心潮澎湃，游戏当中的画面也做得非常不错，推荐！！！极力推荐！！！

nice
令人窒息的一款伟大经典，剧情，谜题，人物（机器人算么）塑造，真是几近完美。G胖你个混蛋为什么不会数三啊！！！

I first played Portal 2 on the playstation 3, but after losing that console, I decided to get it on PC because I just cannot survive without this game. The reviews beneath mine tell you enough of how amazing it is but let me stress it to you for the 99999999th time. THIS GAME IS ONE OF THE GREATEST GAMES EVER MADE. Ingenious puzzles along with witty and great humor. Plot is spot on and the mystery of aperture sends chills down your spine and the easter eggs only make you question what you think you know about Aperture. Valve, once again, fails miserably at failure and lets out, in my opinion, one of their finest products and also one of the greatest videogames ever made. 

Buy it. 



Dude just buy it.




*picks up chair* buy the Goddamn game.




*picks up combustible lemon* here we go.

I got portal 2 a few days ago, and everything was working fine, however yesterday and today it's been a bit buggy and it crashes whenever I want to create a test chamber and only when i want to create a test chamber.

在劇情和解謎之間得到了很好的平衡，而且不會因為迷題關卡過多而感到沉悶， 因為遊戲的劇情十分引人入勝
如果玩完之後想接受更多挑戰，除了再玩一次之外，也可以試試由同好製作的各種地圖或者MOD
在雙人模式下謎題解法也更多樣化
總體來說，這個作品很值得多玩幾次，慢慢探索遊戲故事的背景
特賣時就快入手吧!

I thought I knew what portal was from seeing some videos on it and what not, since puzzle games arent really my thing i never bothered picking them up... till i saw them on sale and thought, meh why not. 

Dear jesus, if I knew this game would not only charm me and give me the sence of gratification it did, I would have bought them the day I got a computer, probably before. This game really surprised me, just perfection.

I think its easier to make a list of things that werent perfect, instead of the things that are. 

- sometimes orrienting yourself after moving through the portals is disorrienting for a moment, you get used to it and become more contious of how your perspective is going to change before you enter the portal so its no longer jarring. - not a big deal.
-There was a single time that I got stuck because I tried the solution too soon (I think, I really am not sure why it happened but it only happened once and I tried to replicate it and i couldnt) and the goop flew with normal physics and not toward the pre-designated target.

Extremely notworthy 
-The story surprised the crap out of me, I thought this game was loved because of its cool mechanics, I genuinely had no idea it had such and amazing story with great writing, wonderful humour and just an awesome tone.  (Im not really tapped into "Gamer Culture")
-There is alot more to the mechanics than just going through the portals and up past the end of the story they still feel fresh, fun and not repetitive in the least.

Portal 2 is a very fun game, much longer than the first one, has a new character, quite a few new elements, some of the original elements, and takes place an unknown time after the prequel. You go back to the old Aperture Science testing facility from the 1900's, and have to get back to the original facility. Overall a fun, recommended game.
7/10.

Ótimo jogo, sequência de um jogo inesperadamente intenso (Recomendo fortemente que comprem o Pack Portal + Portal 2 quando puderem) a história não decepciona. 

Não há mistério nos controles do jogo, são simples na perfeita medida para que você foque na história e nos puzzles. Novas mecânicas são adicionadas conforme o jogo avança, o que evita a repetição. 

O jogo usa a engine Source 2, da própria Valve, que eu pessoalmente gosto muito por proporcionar belos visuais sem requerer muito do PC

非常棒的一部作品，各种精妙绝伦的设计和让人不禁发掘的剧情，给我带来了非常棒的体验。
[spoiler]“从漫长的睡眠中醒来，我便踏上了冒险，经历了重重关卡，最后伴随着合奏的音乐，被送上地表后，打开门的那一瞬间所见到的黄金原野，只是美极了。
    尤其是经过前面所看到的景色后所感到的对比，不过感觉有点寂寞，因为只有主角一个人，和一个a爱心方块。
    后面我上网补了下背景剧情，感觉最遗憾的事情就是还是不知到鼠人最后怎么样了。
    最后丢出来的那个方块所带来的意义，让人不禁思考。”[/spoiler]
Best Villain in any game, hands down.  This game gets it all right, story, humor, action, puzzles, and elation.
